description: Environmental Impact Assessment Screening Opinion: Section 73 application to vary Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission (17/0055/FUMOPDC) for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the redevelopment of the site to provide two new buildings ranging from 6 storeys (24 metres above ground level) to 19 storeys (71.8 metres above ground level) in height, comprising 609 sqm (GIA) of ground floor flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A 1 / A2/ A3/ A4/Bl /Dl /D2), 514 sqm (GIA) ground floor workspace (Use Class Bl/Artist Studios) and 200 residential units (Use Class C3) with disabled car parking, plant space, amenity space, landscaping and associated works‚Äù to primarily: increase the number of residential units (Use Class C3) from 200 to 241; increase the maximum height of the scheme from 19 storeys to 22 storeys (71.8 to 77.5 metres above ground level); and increase the provision of accessible car parking.
